/start:
Hello! I'm Instagram Bot. I'm able to find out your unfollowers on Instagram!

Learn more about commands /help.
/help:
You can control me by sending these commands:

/listunfollowers - get list of people who doesn't follow you back
/subscribe - bot will notify you about new unfollowers
/unsubscribe - stop getting notifications about new unfollowers
/listunfollowers: Please, enter a username of Instagram account to get a list of unfollowers.
/subscribe: Please, enter a username of Instagram account to get notifications about new unfollowers.
/unsubscribe:
OK, you want to unsubscribe. Are you sure? 
Send `Yes` to confirm you really want to unsubscribe from getting notifications about new unfollowers.
SUBSCRIBE_ok: You have successfully subscribe to getting notifications about new unfollowers for this user!
SUBSCRIBE_user_already_subscribed_error:
It seems that you are already subscribed...

If you want to subscribe to another Instagram account, firstly, you need to /unsubscribe.
UNSUBSCRIBE_error: Sorry, but you are not able to unsubscribe, because you are not subscribed yet.
UNFOLLOWERS_LIST_error:
Sorry...
I couldn't get a list of unfollowers.

Please, try again later.
CANCEL_ok:
The command has been cancelled. Anything else I can do for you?

Send /help for a list of commands...
CANCEL_error: No active command to cancel. I wasn't doing anything anyway. Zzzzz...
INSTAGRAM_user_not_found:
User with this username doesn't exist on Instagram

Type /cancel to cancel the opearation.
INSTAGRAM_user_is_private: This user has a private profile.
DEFAULT: Send me /help to see a list of commands
